Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Colin Kaepernick immediately lost his Nike endorsement after an anti-white rant, when in fact he still has his Nike deal.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Colin Kaepernick still has his Nike endorsement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement that Kaepernick lost his endorsement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Kaepernick made an "anti-white rant" without providing any evidence or context to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim was based on false information from a now-deleted website, Conservative Columns, which copied the story from a satire site, America's Last Line of Defense.
